title: A-Mass Flooring & Tile | Massachusetts Flooring and Tile Experts
description: Top-rated Massachusetts flooring and tile company offering expert residential and commercial services in tile, hardwood flooring, dustless sanding, luxury vinyl plank and tile (LVP/LVT), carpet, VCT, rubber, and sheet flooring. We also specialize in high-quality kitchen and bathroom renovations.
stylesheets: .wrapper { width: 100%; max-width: 1200px; padding: 0 25px; margin: 0 auto; box-sizing: border-box;}
.center { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; }
.space-apart { display: flex; gap: 20px; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; }

button, .btn {all: unset; cursor: pointer; font-weight: bold; color: var(--accent-color); font-weight: 700; text-transform: capitalize; padding: 15px 35px; border-radius: 3px; background-color: #fff; }
.view-section { height: 100vh; max-height: 1500px; color: var(--accent-color); overflow: hidden;}
.view-section h2 + p { font-size: 1.5rem; margin-bottom: 2rem; max-width: 800px; line-height: 1.5; }
.thumbnail { position: relative; width: 100%; padding-top: 56.25%; overflow: hidden; background: #eee; border-radius: 3px; }
.thumbnail > img { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; }
